markdownRemark.html: Situated 15 minutes from Cordoba in the Sierra Morena. The position of this golf course is not urbanized and you can enjoy nature to the fullest. The field is quite technical, with narrow streets and not a very long route. There is a restaurant onsite that serves good food.

frontmatter.title: Club De Campo De Córdoba
frontmatter.description: Club De Campo De Córdoba - Situated 15 minutes from Cordoba in the Sierra Morena. The position of this golf course is not urbanized and you can enjoy nature to the fullest. The field is quite technical, with narrow streets and not a very long route. There is a restaurant onsite that serves good food.
frontmatter.price: Highest green fee weekdays 40.00 euros, Highest green fee weekends 75.00 euros
